carl.abr.IO

Class GPS_listener

  • java.lang.Object
    • carl.abr.IO.GPS_listener

  • public class GPS_listener
extends java.lang.Object
    Listener used to interact with GPS. Once registered with the LocationManager, the function onLocationChanged(Location) will be called every time the GPS sends a new fix (location coordinates).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GPS_listener()
      Constructor that initializes NEW_LOCATION to false.

    • Method Detail

      • get_location

        public Location get_location()
        Returns the new GPS location.
        Returns:
        -Location object of the last known GPS fix.
        -null if the location has already been accessed and/or has not been updated yet.
